trans-unit.source: Manages serialization plug-ins created, using <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref>, by manufacturers who have their own proprietary serialization formats.
trans-unit.target: 管理序列化的插件创建，使用<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref>，由具有其自己的专有的序列化格式的制造商。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider"></xref> class.
Only fully trusted callers can create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任调用方可以创建一种<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an object derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> class for the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> that will use the specified descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 初始化对象派生自抽象<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>类指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>，将使用指定的描述符。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted applications can call CreateSerializerWriter.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的应用程序可以调用 CreateSerializerWriter。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> that contains serialization information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
The <xref:System.IO.Stream> to which the returned object writes.
An object of a class derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
One of the parameters is null.
The serializerDescriptor is specifying the wrong version.
-or- It is not registered.
-or- The assembly file cannot be found.
-or- The assembly cannot be loaded.
Gets a collection of the installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: 获取已安装的插件序列化程序的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> objects already registered.
Registers a serializer plug-in.
trans-unit.target: 注册插件的序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的调用可以使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret an already registered plug-in as the same one if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将解释已注册插件为同一个如果它是所有这些属性中相同︰ <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to overwrite an existing registration for the same plug-in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要为同一插件; 覆盖现有注册否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
serializerDescriptor is null.
overwrite is and the plug-in is already registered.
trans-unit.target: overwrite是和已注册该插件。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a serializer plug-in from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 从注册表中删除插件的序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的调用可以使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret a registered plug-in as the same one passed to this method only if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将解释注册插件视为相同的其中一个可以将其传递给此方法仅当它为所有这些属性中相同︰ <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
serializerDescriptor is null.
The plug-in is not registered.
See **Remarks**.
